user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion and we want to play a game of guessing characters from books. Can you provide me with a list of famous characters from various books? It would be great if you could limit the number of responses and skip some characters. Additionally, please fetch a dad joke related to family gatherings to make the reunion more enjoyable.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of famous characters from various books, limiting the number of responses and skipping some characters.
Fetch a dad joke related to family gatherings.
